      • FileRenameAction

        public FileRenameAction(File src,
                File dst,
                boolean renameEmptyFiles)
        Creates an FileRenameAction.
        Parameters:
        src - current file name.
        dst - new file name.
        renameEmptyFiles - if true, rename file even if empty, otherwise delete empty files.
